definition: local bully/tyrant/regional mafia boss
a wise man knows better than to fight when the odds are against him (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 han4 bu4 chi1 yan3 qian2 kui1

definition: Only an outstanding talent can recognize current trends (idiom). A wise man submits to circumstances.
pinyin: shi2 shi2 wu4 zhe3 wei4 jun4 jie2

definition: lit. the sky is high and the emperor is far away (idiom)/fig. remote places are beyond the reach of the central government
a centipede dies but never falls down/old institutions die hard
pinyin: bai3 zu2 zhi1 chong2 si3 er2 bu4 jiang1

definition: peaceful measures before using force (idiom); diplomacy before violence/jaw-jaw is better than war-war
lit. not for the monk's sake but for the Buddha's sake (idiom)/fig. (to do sth for sb) out of deference to sb else
pinyin: bu4 kan4 seng1 mian4 kan4 fo2 mian4

definition: He who comes is surely ill-intentioned, no-one well-meaning will come (idiom)./Be careful not to trust foreigners./Beware of Greeks bearing gifts!
pinyin: lai2 zhe3 bu4 shan4 , shan4 zhe3 bu4 lai2

definition: lit. when one beats a dog, one must answer to its master (idiom)/fig. before punishing sb, one should consider how that would affect others associated with him
pinyin: da3 gou3 hai2 dei3 kan4 zhu3 ren2

definition: many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
lit. easy to dodge the spear in the open, hard to avoid a stab in the dark (idiom); it is hard to guard against secret conspiracies
pinyin: ming2 qiang1 yi4 duo3 , an4 jian4 nan2 fang2

definition: the shot hits the bird that pokes its head out (idiom)/nonconformity gets punished
as they say, .../as the saying goes, ...
lit. without the lips, the teeth feel the cold (idiom); fig. intimately interdependent
It is better to squash enmity rather than keeping it alive (proverb)
pinyin: yuan1 jia1 yi2 jie3 bu4 yi2 jie2

definition: lit. under a big tree the shade is plentiful (idiom)/fig. to benefit by proximity to an influential person
pinyin: da4 shu4 di3 xia4 hao3 cheng2 liang2
